data.message: But y u ready fa war wouldnt u rather sleep n snaw! Here put this pen in your hand and  go sitt on tha floor, and write sumthin down that don't gotta do with violence, silence!  Enough said now go outside and instead of shootin this nigga in that head give him a peace of bread! Like I said don't take life too serious cause than it gets mysterious so  just 4get about war hey as a matter affact just come knock on my door I can go on sum more but I rather sleep n snaw.. (knock)(knock)

replies.message: I love these rhymes but not as much as I love  Idah Chrispin Peresuh
